topic.title: Local Resolution Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated to Patient Date (Nhs Continuing Healthcare)
topic.shortdesc: Local Resolution Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated To Patient Date (NHS Continuing Healthcare) is the date the local resolution eligibility decision outcome for NHS Continuing Healthcare was communicated in writing to the PATIENT.
